bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with xu lei 虛羸 , depletion and thinness. Pu ji fang 普濟方 353: 黃芪飲 子，治產後體虛瘦，四肢少力 , “The drink with huang qi cures physical depletion emaciation following delivery, with the four limbs lacking strength”.

②Designation of pharmaceutical substances that are hollow and shriveled. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai bu 百部：其根長者近尺，新時亦肥實，但乾則虛瘦無脂潤 爾 , “The root is almost one chi long. When it is fresh, it is fat and solid. But when dried it is hollow and shriveled and lacks fat and moisture”.
